title: Generate a Diversity Report
description: The Chief Diversity Officer needs a report on the company's workforce demographics (gender, ethnicity) by job level.

tasks.description: Access the reporting tools in the HRIS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst navigates to the correct reporting module.

tasks.description: Run a report that includes employee demographic data and their current job level.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst generates the raw data from the system.

tasks.description: Create pivot tables and charts to visualize the demographic breakdown at each level of the organization.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst creates a clear, visual presentation of the company's diversity metrics.
